articles.title: KCNA Commentary Slams Planned Nuclear Summit in Seoul
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Slams Planned Nuclear Summit in Seoul
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and the south Korean puppet regime are scheduled to hold a "nuclear security summit" in Seoul in late March.
					 The U.S., the world's first nuclear criminal, and south Korea, the world's biggest nuclear arsenal, are to hold the international discussion on the "nuclear security" which is supposed to showcase the conspiracy between the master and a stooge.
					
					 It is illogical to discuss the "nuclear security" issue in south Korea, the U.S. nuclear advance base and a hotbed of nuclear war. 
					
					 Worse still, the summit is scheduled when Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military drills, rehearsals for a nuclear war against the north, would be under way. This is a mockery and insult to the international community.
					
					 The planned "nuclear security summit" is continuity and extension of the U.S. and south Korea's nuclear racket against the DPRK.
					
					 Through the "summit" south Korea seeks to justify its smear anti-DPRK campaign and a nuclear war moves by taking advantage of the U.S. moves to stifle the DPRK under the pretext of non-existent "nuclear threat" from it.
					
					 Its foolish immediate objective is to divert public criticism stemming from its total domestic and foreign policy failure and evade a stern judgment by the people through "general election".
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak regime, which is more dead than alive being isolated in and out, is making efforts to whitewash itself, availing itself of the "summit". But it will only invite infamy of dirty stooge and top nuclear war servant.
					
					 The "nuclear security summit", a serious criminal act and unpardonable provocation against the north, runs counter to the desire of the Koreans and the world people for peace and security on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The summit will only backfire, leaving an adverse impact on solving the nuclear issue on the Peninsula and disgrace and blot in the history.

articles.title: Greetings from Indonesian, Senegalese and Mongolian Political Party Leaders
articles.content:
Greetings from Indonesian, Senegalese and Mongolian Political Party Leaders
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the DPRK people and vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea, received messages of greeting from S. Batbold, chairman of the Mongolian People's Party, General Chairwoman Megawati Soekarnoputri and Secretary General Tjahjo Kumolo of the Central Directive Council of the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle, and Mamadou Lamin Thiam, national permanent secretary of the Democratic Party of Senegal, respectively on Feb. 14 and 15 on the occasion of the 70th birth anniversary of general secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 The messages praised Kim Jong Il as a great leader who performed great exploits in developing the DPRK into a thriving nation under the banner of the Juche idea.
					
					 They expressed belief that the Korean people would achieve greater prosperity under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Greetings to Guyanese President
articles.content:
Greetings to Guyanese President 
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on February 23 sent a message of greeting to Guyanese President Donald Ramota on the 42nd anniversary of the Cooperative Republic of Guyana.
					 Kim in the message wished the president success in his work for the country's socio-economic progress and the Guyanese people advance and prosperity.

articles.title: Greetings to Minister of Foreign Affairs and Trade of Brunei Darussalam
articles.content:
Greetings to Minister of Foreign Affairs and Trade of Brunei Darussalam
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun Thursday sent a message of greeting to Mohamed Bolkiah, minister of Foreign Affairs and Trade of Brunei Darussalam, on its national day.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in the future and wished the minister success in his work.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Praises Kim Jong Il's Exploits
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Praises Kim Jong Il's Exploits 
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- General secretary Kim Jong Il was the greatest leader in the present era as he performed undying exploits, glorifying his life for decades like the red flag after shouldering upon himself the destiny of socialism in the complicated and difficult period. Rodong Sinmun Thursday says this in a bylined article. 
					 The article goes on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il clarified the scientific accuracy and truth of socialism and inevitability of its victory through his energetic ideological and theoretical activities, encouraging the world progressive people and strongly reacting against the anti-socialist moves of the imperialists. 
					
					 He contributed the discourse "Abuses of Socialism Are Intolerable" to Kulloja, official magazine of the Workers' Party of Korea Central Committee, on March 1, Juche 82 (1993). In the discourse he said the claim that socialism is "totalitarian", "barracks-like" and "administrative and commanding" is nothing but a fabrication and sophism of the imperialists. 
					
					 His treatise "Socialism Is a Science" published on November 1, 1994 serves as a famous work as it saved the world socialist movement from the chaotic crisis and provided an ideological, theoretical and practical guarantee for its victorious advance. 
					
					 He comprehensively established the Songun politics, providing an invincible weapon for defending the cause of socialism and victoriously advancing it. 
					
					 He pursued the Songun politics with the Korean People's Army as its mainstay, frustrating the imperialists' moves to stifle the DPRK and defending socialism and the destiny of the country and nation during the hardest period -- the Arduous March, forced march -- and thereby paving the road of building a thriving socialist nation. 
					
					 The anti-imperialist independent countries and those countries desirous of socialism are now attaching importance to military affairs and frustrating the imperialists' moves to isolate, stifle and encircle them, regarding their armies as mainstays, inspired by Kim Jong Il's Songun politics.

articles.title: Minju Joson on Dangerous Nature of S. Korea-U.S. Anti-Sub Drills
articles.content:
Minju Joson on Dangerous Nature of S. Korea-U.S. Anti-Sub Drills
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and south Korean warmongers launched the largest-ever joint anti-sub drills in the West Sea of Korea on Feb. 20, saying that the "Cheonan" warship sinking case proved the possibility of the operation of the north's subs in the West Sea.
					 In this regard Minju Joson Thursday says in a bylined commentary that by waging the exercises under the pretext of the warship case they seek to convince the public that the warship was sunken by the DPRK.
					
					 The anti-sub drills are aimed at locating the DPRK's subs and striking them in the territorial waters of the DPRK after provoking a war against it.
					
					 They have staged many similar war exercises so far, but it is the first time that Aegis destroyers are mobilized.
					
					 This explicitly shows what a dangerous stage their move to invade the DPRK has reached.
					
					 The south Korean conservatives are working hard to lay a foundation for coming to power again by turning the table in their favor in the forthcoming elections by creating "insecurity" through the large-scale war drills. When they fail in this, they are going to ignite a war.
					
					 It is necessary to keep vigilance against the tendentious war drills.

articles.title: Papers Condemn Japanese Imperialists for Cooking up "Korea-Japan Protocol"
articles.content:
Papers Condemn Japanese Imperialists for Cooking up "Korea-Japan Protocol" 
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- The Korean people clearly remember in what coercive manner Japan imposed the "Korea-Japan Protocol" upon Korea on February 23, 1904. They will surely force it to pay dearly for this. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday observes this in a bylined article. Japan's attempt to fabricate the criminal protocol dates back to early in the 20th century, the article notes. But, it could not realize this in face of the strong opposition on the part of the Korean feudal government. 
					
					 Citing facts to prove that the protocol was an illegal and invalid document fabricated by the Japanese imperialists through highhanded practices, threats and coercion, the article goes on:
					
					 By fabricating the brigandish protocol, the Japanese imperialists provided legal conditions for turning Korea into their colony. In the subsequent period, they, using the protocol as a framework, cooked up the "Ulsa Five-point Treaty" in 1905 and the "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty" in 1910. 
					
					 Nevertheless, Japan is still insisting on the "legality" of the "treaties" faked by the Japanese imperialists in a brigandish manner including the "Korea-Japan Protocol." 
					
					 This is absolutely intolerable as it was the falsification of the historical facts and violation of international law. A particular mention should be made of the facts that the Japanese reactionary forces are denying, embellishing and  justifying what the Japanese imperialists committed in the past, letting loose a spate of such reckless remarks as "'Korea-Japan annexation' was the choice made by Koreans" and "there were agreements with different countries of the world". This is a revelation of their criminal intention to go without settling the crimes committed in the past and repeat their history of aggression. 
					
					 Minju Joson says if Japan launches militarist overseas aggression again, seized by its foolish daydream, failing to face up to the situation, it will never get rid of the abyss of ruin.

articles.title: Kim Hong Do, Korean Realistic Painter
articles.content:
Kim Hong Do, Korean Realistic Painter
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Kim Hong Do was a realistic painter, representative of the Korean artists in the 18th -19th centuries.
					 Born with remarkable drawing talents, he created numbers of drawings all his life, ranging from figure and landscape paintings, portraits, wooden prints and religious pictures, many of them being considered masterpieces.
					
					 Influenced by realism, he paved a way of drawing realistic pictures, bidding farewell to painting style employed by aristocrats at that time. 
					
					 Based on diverse themes and unique drawing techniques, his paintings beautified working and enjoyable life of popular people, while ridiculing feudal bureaucrats for their corruption.
					
					 Typical of them are "Picture of Peasant's Life", "Picking Medicinal Herbs", "Wrestling", "Gambling of Aristocrats", "Kuryong Falls" and "Boat".
					
					 His drawings that marked a new milestone in Korea's picturing in that period are preserved as national treasures.

articles.title: Song Reflecting Strong Faith of Korean People
articles.content:
Song Reflecting Strong Faith of Korean People
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- A grand performance for commemorating the Day of the Shining Star (Feb. 16), the birth anniversary of general secretary Kim Jong Il, is going on before full houses at  Pyongyang Indoor Stadium.
					 The song "We Will Be Loyal Down through Generations", the title and  theme music of the performance, was created in Juche 60 (1971) when Kim Jong Il was working at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 This song reflects the strong will of the Korean people to boundlessly respect Kim Jong Il and hold him in high esteem forever.
					
					 It shows the people's earnest yearning for him who had worked heart and soul for their happiness and tells about his devotion to the country.
					
					 Through quiet and soft melody it also gives a vivid description of the people's steadfast will to remain loyal to him.
					
					 The song is much loved by the Korean army and people for its profound content and high artistic value.
					
					 This song was used in group dance in the latter half of the 1970s.

articles.title: Family Photo of Korean People
articles.content:
Family Photo of Korean People 
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- The newly-released feature film "Wishes" is popular among Korean people. 
					 The film deals with the life of a serviceman's family and tells about the family's wishes.
					
					 The wife of an officer, heroine of the film, wishes to have a family photo taken with her husband who is taking part in the construction of the Huichon Power Station.
					
					 At last, her husband comes home from the construction site under an order to have a rest and, consequently, fails to have a picture taken with leader Kim Jong Il who visited the construction site. His wife feels very sorry for this failure.
					
					 Later, the heroine takes part in the contest among servicemen's wives art groups and has the honor of posing for a picture with the leader. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il visited the construction site again and provided a photo session for the heroine's husband and other servicemen who failed to pose for souvenir picture with him during his previous visit.
					
					 After all, the wishes of a serviceman's family to have a photo taken with Kim Jong Il as their eternal family photo were realized.
					
					 This story shows what the wishes of all the Korean people are.
					
					 The people in the DPRK have held President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem as not only their great leaders but also father of the whole country. They regarded it as their highest honor and glory to have pictures taken with Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, peerlessly great persons.
					
					 In actuality many families in the DPRK have such pictures and hold them much more valuable than their family photos.
					
					 Kim Song Mi (30), a citizen residing in Pyongyang, said: "My family has a souvenir picture my parents posed for with leader Kim Jong Il.  This is an heirloom of my family and it is the eternal family photo."
					
					 Paek Ryon Hui, heroine in the film, successfully performed monodrama "Wishes" at the fourth round of the 2nd-term contest among servicemen's wives art groups of the Korean People's Army and had the honor to be received by Kim Jong Il and have a photo session with him.
					
					 The film is based on the monodrama.

articles.title: Revolutionary Cause Will Be Successfully Completed :IIJI Secretary General
articles.content:
Revolutionary Cause Will Be Successfully Completed :IIJI Secretary General 
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- The revolutionary cause of general secretary Kim Jong Il will be successfully realized.
					 Kenichi Ogami, secretary general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea who visited the DPRK to commemorate the birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il, said this after touring the venue of the 16th Kimjongilia Festival.
					
					 He said he enshrined deep reverence for General Secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea Kim Jong Il, who is always alive in the hearts of the world progressive people.
					
					 He continued:
					
					 Kim Jong Il passed away to our regret while working hard for the prosperity of socialist Korea and the people's happiness.
					
					 He devoted himself to the people, not caring about himself. That is why we could hardly hold back our tears.
					
					 We had an opportunity to see portraits of smiling Kim Jong Il in various parts of the capital during our visit.
					
					 When we looked up to his image, our mind seemed to have become brightened.
					
					 The General Secretary provided a sure guarantee for the accomplishment of the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 The dear respected Kim Jong Un stands in the van of the Korean people who turned out in the building of a thriving nation.
					
					 Thanks to him, the revolutionary cause of Kim Jong Il will be successfully completed.
					
					 The DPRK's future is bright as the Korean people uphold Kim Jong Un as the successor to the revolutionary cause of Juche.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Praised by Korean in U.S.
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Praised by Korean in U.S. 
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- "Minjok Thongsin" carried an article on Feb. 20 written by Ro Kil Nam, representative of "Minjok Thongsin", Koreans' internet paper in the U.S., praising the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					 He took part in commemorations of the Day of the Shining Star as a member of the delegation of the Federation of Koreans in the U.S.
					
					 The article said:
					
					 When Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un was taking the platform of the national meeting commemorating the 70th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il, its participants broke into enthusiastic applause, looking up to him. These warm cheers continued from its beginning to its close.
					
					 This was an expression of the firm belief and trust of the compatriots in the north ready to always uphold and follow Kim Jong Un, faithful successor to the cause of President Kim Il Sung and Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It was a delusion that the anti-DPRK hostile forces foolishly conducted false propaganda and smear campaign to tarnish the image of the north after the great loss to the nation in December.
					
					 The political activities of Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, identical to President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, have become the focus of the world political arena and drawn great concern of the media of the international community.
					
					 Recalling that he exchanged conversations about Kim Jong Un with overseas compatriots from China, Russia, etc. during his visit to the north, the article noted that all of them were unanimous in praising him as a friendly and tender-hearted man.
					
					 The article went on:
					
					 The compatriots in the north have long been blessed with the illustrious leaders and generals and ardently revered him, singing the song of "Footsteps".
					
					 All the compatriots desirous of national reunification and peace on the Korean Peninsula extend profound thanks to Kim Jong Il for performing an undying great feat on behalf of the country and the nation by enabling them to hold another sun in high esteem.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Suppression of Progressive Forces under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Suppression of Progressive Forces under Fire
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- The campaign for cracking down upon progressive forces kicked up by the south Korean authorities recently discloses their sinister intention to create a terror-ridden atmosphere in the run-up to the "parliamentary election" and realize their wild ambition to stay in power.
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday says in a by-lined commentary in this regard:
					
					 The south Korean conservative forces have become the target of public curses and criticism for all sorts of crimes committed in four years of their office and are now in the grip of the worst ruling crisis.
					
					 Taken aback by the daily growing actions of the people from all walks of life to judge its regime, the Lee Myung Bak group has kicked off a fresh whirlwind of crackdown upon the progressive forces in a bid to attain its sinister aims to calm down the anti-"government" sentiment and rally conservative forces.
					
					 The Lee group seeks to achieve the "security of its regime" and stay in power by invoking the "Security Law" just as the successive traitorous rulers did.
					
					 The Lee group's ruling crisis is a product of its own incompetency, irregularities, corruption and unpopular rule.
					
					 Absolutely unjustifiable is the frantic suppression of the progressive forces intensified by the group on the strength of the SL as it is a mean and shameless action.

articles.title: S. Korean Christian Church Slams Anti-DPRK Joint Military Drills
articles.content:
S. Korean Christian Church Slams Anti-DPRK Joint Military Drills
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- The Council of Christian Churches in south Korea in a statement on Feb. 21 called for ending all acts including military drills that may trigger military conflicts between the north and the south.
					 The U.S.-south Korea DPRK-targeted war drills escalate tension between the two sides of Korea and throw a stumbling block in bringing peace to the Korean Peninsula, the statement said.
					
					 The war drills called "regular exercises" can plunge the peninsula into an unpredictable phase, it added.
					
					 It urged the "government" to withdraw the "May 24 measure" and make efforts for peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula on the principle of dialogue, cooperation and mutual respect, the spirit of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.

articles.title: S. Korean Conservatives' Praise of Erstwhile Dictator under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Conservatives' Praise of Erstwhile Dictator under Fire 
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- The solidarity for defending the just history grouping organizations of people from all walks of life to check the moves to beautify the pro-Japanese and dictatorial actions and the retrogressive revision of textbooks issued a statement on Feb. 21 denouncing the conservative regime for praising the dictatorship of Park Chung-Hee.
					 Accusing the conservative forces of opening a library praising Park who left an indelible blot in the history of politics of south Korea, the statement noted that this would be recorded as one more reckless action against history.
					
					 It branded such action of the conservatives as part of the moves to justify their privilege and prolong it.
					
					 In case that such action is allowed, it will eventually lead to the tragic praises of dictators Chun Doo Hwan and Roh Thae Woo, and it will be absolutely impossible for all south Koreans to free from the tyrannical rule of dictators, it noted.
					
					 The statement urged the conservatives to close the library, declaring that Park is not a man to be praised but to be cursed for all ages.

articles.title: Abrogation of SL Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Abrogation of SL Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Elder reverends of religious organizations of south Korea including the Peace and Justice Committee of the Council of Christian Churches and the Human Rights Center of Churches held a press conference at the Christian Hall in Jongro of Seoul on Feb. 21 calling for the abrogation of the "security law" (SL) which violates the religious belief and freedom of conscience.
					 At the press conference, the speakers said that the fascist law has become more draconic under the Lee Myung Bak regime though it should have been already repealed.
					
					 The SL itself dampens the desire of the people to live in a genuine and upright manner, they charged, adding:
					
					 The damage done by the law has reached an extreme phase as evidenced by the facts that the reverends were judged and arrested though they devoted themselves to peace and the country's reunification and even their houses were searched.
					
					 No evil law can arrest the struggle for the freedom of religious belief and conscience and social democracy, they noted, strongly demanding the abrogation of the SL.
					
					 They declared they would make joint efforts for the repeal of the law and the release of the prisoners of conscience in solidarity with the organizations all out in actions for the repeal of the SL.
					
					 A statement was issued at the conference.

articles.title: Political Imposters Produced by Ruling Quarters of S. Korea
articles.content:
Political Imposters Produced by Ruling Quarters of S. Korea
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- The story about the "explosion of the north's light water reactor" that threw the stock market into a great mayhem in south Korea was confirmed to be a wild rumor faked up by manipulators of stock price. 
					 Rumor was afloat on stock markets in south Korea in January that radioactivity of high intensity caused by the north's light water reactor that exploded during their test operation was rapidly reaching Seoul.
					
					 The stock index rapidly plunged at the stock markets greatly discomfited by this news.
					
					 According to a disclosure, a staffer of a south Korean business worked on the subject and contents of a rumor in a bid to cause a stock price decline.
					
					 Nothing is more ridiculous than this.
					
					 A fraud was committed over the issue of the north's LWR to manipulate stock price by abusing the feelings of the people. This is a clear indication of how malignantly the group of traitors pulled up the north over its use of nuclear energy for peaceful purposes. 
					
					 As the ruling quarters are old hands at concocting rumors and hatching plots and manipulators of smear campaigns against compatriots, it is commonplace for staffers of a common business to find fault with compatriots in a bid to make money.
					
					 Swindlers are being produced by the ruling quarters who are now paying a dear price for their evil deeds.
					
					 The wild rumor about the north's LWR was floated this time and nobody knows what type political imposters will emerge tomorrow. This is what happens in south Korea.
					
					 The above-said story is a clear indication of the corrupt political landscape of south Korea and the symptoms of doom of the present "government." This lays bare the miserable position of the Lee Myung Bak group finding itself in the abyss of ruin.

articles.title: West Should Change Approach towards Iran: FM
articles.content:
West Should Change Approach towards Iran: FM 
 Tehran, February 22 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister Ali Akbar Salehi said on Sunday that there are too many contradictions in the words and deeds of western countries and expressed the hope they would change approach to the Islamic Republic of Iran. 
					 Salehi made the remarks in a joint conference with his Nicaraguan counterpart Samuel Santos Lopez in Tehran on Sunday. 
					
					 It is over thirty years that the western countries have used the language of force against the Iranian nation but to no avail and it is advisable for them to change approach and start interaction instead of confrontations, Salehi said.

articles.title: Thousands Rally against U.S. in Pakistani Capital
articles.content:
Thousands Rally against U.S. in Pakistani Capital
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Thousands of people rallied in the Pakistani capital Islamabad on Monday, protesting against the U.S. policies, strikes by American spy aircraft in the country's tribal regions and the restoration of NATO supplies by the government.
					 Political and religious leaders lashed out at the U.S. and held it responsible for instability in the region and terrorism in Pakistan.
					
					 They condemned the U.S. for launching reckless military actions to kill innocent people in Pakistan and Afghanistan.

articles.title: Jordan Says Israeli Settlers' Breaking into al-Aqsa Mosque Provocative to Muslims
articles.content:
Jordan Says Israeli Settlers' Breaking into al-Aqsa Mosque Provocative to Muslims
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Jordan's Foreign Minister Nasser Judeh said Sunday that the Israeli settlers' breaking into al-Aqsa Mosque was provocative to the feelings of Muslims, the state-run Petra news agency reported.
					 "Jordan rejects such systematic and dangerous attempts by a group of radical Israelis that are accompanied by political figures and Knesset members who prepare for storming the mosque publically citing pretexts that contradict with historic facts and the Arab and Islamic heritage of the mosque," Judeh was quoted as saying.

articles.title: Pakistan Condemns U.S. House Bill on Balochistan
articles.content:
Pakistan Condemns U.S. House Bill on Balochistan
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Pakistani Foreign Minister Hina Rabbani Khar on Saturday condemned a bill submitted to the U.S. House of Representatives on Pakistan's southwestern Balochistan province.
					 Hina Rabbani Khar in a statement took a strong exception to the bill and said that the bill was contrary to the principles of UN Charter and international law. 
					
					 Pakistan's ambassador in Washington on Saturday reacted strongly to the resolution on Balochistan in the U.S. Congress, saying that such resolution was "provocative".

articles.title: EU Sows Discord among Zimbabweans by Partial Lifting of Sanctions: FM
articles.content:
EU Sows Discord among Zimbabweans by Partial Lifting of Sanctions: FM
Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- The Zimbabwean government on Monday said the EU's recent partial lifting of sanctions on the southern African country was a mischievous ploy aimed at sowing seeds of divisions among Zimbabweans.
					 Foreign Affairs Minister Simbarashe Mumbengegwi told state radio that Zimbabwe has always insisted on the unconditional removal of the sanctions in their entirety as there was no justification or reason for their imposition in the first place.
					
					 Mumbengegwi said Zimbabweans will not be deceived by the partial lifting of the sanctions which he described as meaningless and cheap propaganda aimed at perpetrating continuous harm to the national economy.

articles.title: China, Bangladesh, India, Myanmar Set up Business Group to Promote Cooperation
articles.content:
China, Bangladesh, India, Myanmar Set Up Business Council to Promote Cooperation
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Business groups from China, Bangladesh, India and Myanmar on Feb. 19 signed an agreement to promote cooperation in economy, trade and investment among the countries.
					 Sri Lanka and Singapore on Feb. 16 signed a Memorandum of Understanding on development of business and investment relations between the two countries.

articles.title: Okinawa Gov. Submits Opinion on Base Relocation, Calls It 'Impossible'
articles.content:
Okinawa Gov. Calls for Moving U.S. Base outside Prefecture
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Okinawa Gov. Hirokazu Nakaima on Monday submitted to the Defense Ministry his opinion on the relocation of a key U.S. base within the southern island prefecture, saying it would be ''impossible'' to protect the environment around the envisaged relocation site under the current plan.
					 The opinion reflects the local community's opposition to the plan and desire to see the U.S. Marine Corps' Futenma Air Station moved outside Okinawa.

articles.title: Depression in Japanese Economy
articles.content:
Japan's Steel Production Down
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Crude steel production in Japan fell down 10.6 percent from a year earlier, the Japan Iron and Steel Federation said Monday.
					 Department store sales in Japan fell 1.1 percent in January from a year earlier on a same-store basis.

articles.title: Japan's Trade Deficit Totals 1.48 Trillion Yen in January
articles.content:
Japan's Trade Deficit Totals 1. 48 Trillion Yen in January
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Japan's trade deficit increased to 1. 48 trillion yen in January, the Ministry of Finance said on Feb. 20.

articles.title: Russian President Clarifies Stand to Continue Bolstering Strategic Rocket Forces
articles.content:
Russia to Continue Bolstering Strategic Rocket Forces 
 Moscow, February 22 (KCNA) -- Russian President Dmitri Medvedev on Tuesday clarified the country's stand to continue strengthening the strategic rocket forces. 
					 Russia will steadily push forward rearming the rocket units with new technological equipment till it thinks that everything is done to  maintain the country's defense capabilities and security at a required level, he said. 
					
					 If the U.S. and NATO deploy the European missile defense system according to the plan, Russia will take counter-steps as it had already declared, he said. This is not a remnant of Russia's militarism or Cold War. Russia can not act otherwise.

articles.title: Russian Air Force Conducts Flight Drills in Sky above Neutral Waters of Black Sea
articles.content:
Russian Air Force Conducts Flight Drills above Neutral Waters of Black Sea
 Moscow, February 22 (KCNA) -- Airplanes of the Russian Air Force conducted flight drills in the sky above the neutral waters of the Black Sea.
					 In the drills, they trained the technique of rounding off the coordination among the crews.
					
					 A spokesman for the Russian Air Force, reporting about the flight drills on Feb. 21, said they did not infringe upon the territorial air of neighboring states in line with the demand of international law.
					
					 The spokesman noted that planes of the air force will hold flight drills in the sky above the sea in the future, too, under the plan of all the military districts.

articles.title: Hu Jintao Stresses Employment
articles.content:
Hu Jintao Calls for Increasing Employment 
 Beijing, February 22 (KCNA) -- More effort needs to be put into bolstering China's job market, President Hu Jintao said.
					 Hu, also general secretary of the Communist Party of China (CPC) Central Committee, made the remarks Monday at the 32nd group study of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee.
					
					 Increasing employment is key to guarantying and improving people's well-being and should be prioritized in China's economic and social development, Hu said.
					
					 China supports laborers and the self-employed through various channels and policies, while pushing forward financial and social assistance to the unemployed, Hu said. All relevant departments or administrations should coordinate with each other to ensure good performance in this area.

articles.title: Wreaths Laid before Liberation Tower and Cemetery of Fallen Fighters of Soviet Army
articles.content:
Wreaths Laid before Liberation Tower and Cemetery of Fallen Fighters of Soviet Army
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Staff members of the Russian embassy here Thursday laid a wreath before the Liberation Tower in Pyongyang on the Day of Defender of the Motherland.
					 Present there were Ambassador Valery E. Sukhinin and Military Attache Dmitri Zheleznikov, and other staff members of the Russian embassy and military attaches of different embassies.
					
					 Laid before the tower was a wreath in the name of the Russian embassy here.
					
					 The participants paid silent tribute to fallen fighters of the Soviet Army.
					
					 The staff members of the embassy laid a wreath and bouquets before the cemetery of fallen fighters of the Soviet Army in Sadong District, Pyongyang on the same day.

articles.title: Palestinian Ambassador Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Palestinian Ambassador Hosts Reception 
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan, Palestinian ambassador to the DPRK, gave a reception at his embassy on Thursday in commemoration of general secretary Kim Jong Il's birth anniversary.
					 Present there on invitation were Kim Yong Il, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, Pak Ui Chun, foreign minister, Hyon Sang Ju, chairman of the C.C., the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea, and others. 
					
					The ambassador said in his speech at the reception that Kim Jong Il devoted his whole life to the struggle for progressive mankind. 
					
					 He expressed belief that the Korean people would bring about fresh miracles and innovations in socialist construction under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Kim Yong Il in his speech said it is a manifestation of their reverence for Kim Jong Il that Palestinian friends were joining the Korean people in significantly commemorating the Day of the Shining Star.
					
					 The Korean people will support the just cause of the Palestinian people to retake the legitimate national rights including the right to self-determination, the right to return home and the right to found a sovereign state, he added.

articles.title: Internet Seminar of East European and Central Asian Regions on Songun Politics Held
articles.content:
Internet Seminar of East European and Central Asian Regions on Songun Politics Held
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- An Internet seminar of the East European and Central Asian Regions on the theme of "Songun politics of general secretary Kim Jong Il" was held on Feb. 12 on the occasion of his birth anniversary.
					 The floor was taken by the general secretary of the International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions, the chairman of the All-Russian Society for the Study and Dissemination of Kimilsungism, the chairman of the Russian Society for Promoting the Study and Dissemination of Comrade Kim Jong Il's Works, the chairman of the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea, the chairman of the Ukrainian "Treasured Sword of Songun" Association for the Study of the Juche Idea, the chairman of the Kazakh Kim Jong Il Association for the Study and Dissemination of the Juche Idea and other personages. Their speeches were titled "Comrade Kim Jong Il, noble paragon of people's leader", "It is behests and feats of the great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il to carry on the revolution generation after generation," etc.
					
					 The speakers praised him as a distinguished thinker and theoretician and man of action and a world-famous statesman who indicated the way to be followed by the era of independence with his original Songun politics.
					
					 He was the people's genuine leader who devoted his whole life to the prosperity of the country and happiness of its people, regarding it as his maxim to believe in people as in Heaven.
					
					 A letter to the dear respected Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar.

articles.title: Exploits Praised by Foreign personages
articles.content:
Exploits Praised by Foreign personages
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Ethiopian and Spanish personages made public statements on Feb. 13 and 15 to mark the birth anniversary of general secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Nigatu Dagnachew Cherinet, chairman of the Ethiopian Youth Study Group of the Juche Idea, said Kim Jong Il developed in depth the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung, achieved the single-minded unity of the whole society and pursued the Songun politics, turning the DPRK into a Juche-oriented socialist power with invincible political and military might.
					
					 Though Kim Jong Il passed away, his august name and immortal feats would always be remembered not only by the Korean people but by the Juche idea followers and progressive people across the world, he added.
					
					 Asto Garcia, secretary for International Relations of the Communist Party of the People of Spain, said the party extends solidarity to the Workers' Party of Korea and Korean people waging a struggle, guided by the behests of Kim Jong Il. Kim Jong Il will always be alive in the hearts of the world progressive people, he added.

articles.title: Birth Anniversary Commemorated by Organizations of UK, Finland
articles.content:
Birth Anniversary Commemorated by Organizations of UK, Finland
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Organizations of the UK and Finland issued their bulletins on the occasion of the birth anniversary of general secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 The British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued the February special issue of its bulletin under the title "Glory to the great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il on his 70th birth anniversary". The bulletin carried articles illustrated with a photo of him waving back to cheering people.
					
					 In an article titled "The great leader of Songun revolution" the bulletin referred in detail to the facts that he developed the Juche idea and the Songun idea, providing a powerful ideological and theoretical weapon to the progressive mankind, and put the dignity and national power of socialist Korea on the highest level with his Songun politics.
					
					 An article titled "HE Kim Jong Il, guardian of peace" stressed that peace has been ensured on the Korean Peninsula thanks to his Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 The Finland-Korea Society on Feb. 13 carried its bulletin "Friends of DPRK" No. 1. The bulletin carried articles titled "Kimjongilia," "DPRK steadily advancing under leadership of HE Kim Jong Un," etc. illustrated with a photo of Kim Jong Il inspecting the Kaeson Youth Park Funfair and a photo of the dear respected Kim Jong Un inspecting the construction site of the Pyongyang Folk Park.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Commemorated in Different Countries
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Commemorated in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries on Feb. 12 and 13 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of general secretary Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star). They included meetings, book and photo exhibitions and film shows in Palestine, Thailand, Italy and Uganda.
					 Displayed in the venues were works of the peerlessly great men, photos of their immortal feats and books and photos of the Korean people building a thriving nation.
					
					 The general secretary of the Palestinian Popular Struggle Front said that Kim Jong Il's was a life devoted to carrying forward the idea and cause of President Kim Il Sung, the founder of socialist Korea,  fighting against the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces and building the DPRK into a powerful nation.
					
					 Though Kim Jong Il passed away, his feats will last forever, the chairman of the Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand said, adding the progressive people will remain unchanged in ardently following and revering him. 
					
					 The Korean people will certainly build a thriving socialist nation under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un who is identical to Kim Jong Il, said the general secretary of the Struggle for the Peace and Socialism of Italy.
					
					 Kim Jong Il was a distinguished leader who turned the DPRK into a political, ideological and military power with his Songun politics, noted the secretary general of the African Regional Committee of Friendship and Solidarity with the Korean People.

articles.title: Work Published in South Africa
articles.content:
Work Published in South Africa
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- General secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Improving the Layout of the Fields Is a Great Transformation of Nature for the Prosperity of the Country, a Patriotic Work of Lasting Significance" was brought out in booklet by the Pretoria Copy Master Publishing House of South Africa on Feb. 14.
					 The work, published in January Juche 89 (2000), deals with the fact that the Workers' Party of Korea raised it as an important work of the agricultural revolution to improve the layout of the fields and clarifies the essence of the said work and the tasks and ways of doing so.

articles.title: Work Carried by Bulletin of British Organization
articles.content:
Work Carried by Bulletin of British Organization
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- The British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea carried the full text of general secretary Kim Jong Il's work "On the Juche Idea" in the February special issue of its bulletin.
					 The work, published on March 31, Juche 71 (1982), deals with the undying historic feats performed by President Kim Il Sung in founding the Juche idea, as well as its significance and the founding, philosophical, socio-historical and guiding principles and historic significance of the Juche idea.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige Fabrica de Balas Deportivas
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige Fabrica de Balas Deportivas 
 Pyongyang, 23 de febrero (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea y Maximo Dirigente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el pueblo coreano, dirigio sobre el terreno la Fabrica de Balas Deportivas. 
					 La fabrica, construida en febrero de 1996 por la iniciativa del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, produce las balas de tiro deportivo que contribuyen al desarrollo de deportes militares. 
					
					 En el recinto de ella esta acondicionado tambien el Centro de Tiro Meari. 
					
					 Ante todo, el Comandante Supremo recorrio los procesos de produccion de balas para el uso deportivo. 
					
					 Pasando revista a los laboratorios quimicos y fisicos y otros procesos productivos desde la produccion de materiales de cartucho hasta el montaje, hizo conocimiento detallado del estado de produccion y de las especificaciones tecnicas y funcionamiento de los equipos. 
					
					 Para ganar buenas notas en la competencia de tiro, los jugadores deben ejercitar mucho el tiro, dijo y agrego que por eso, esta fabrica debe producir las balas en gran cantidad y suministrarlas a ellos. 
					
					 Para aumentar la produccion de balas y mejorar su calidad, es preciso modernizar la fabrica al nivel del nuevo siglo, destaco y tomo medidas necesarias para el respecto. 
					
					 Acto seguido, estuvo en el campo de tiro bajo techo y el otro al aire libre y otros puntos del Centro de Tiro Meari averiguando los detalles de operacion y servicio de este establecimiento. 
					
					 Vio con atencion la pistola deportiva usada por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il durante su visita de orientacion al lugar, las posiciones de tiro, los blancos, los asientos de espectadores, etc. 
					
					 Disparando personalmente, probo la concentracion de las balas hechas en la fabrica y sopeso la luminosidad y la insonorizacion del campo de tiro. 
					
					 Administrar bien este centro es una labor importante para materializar cabalmente el legado del Dirigente para mejorar la vida cultural del pueblo, asevero. 
					
					 Insistio en la necesidad de modernizar la fabrica  en un corto tiempo y reconstruir magnificamente a la altura de la era del Songun el Centro de Tiro Meari y presento las tareas y remedios concretos para ese fin. 
					
					 El Comandante Supremo fue acompanado en esta ocasion por Jang Song Thaek, miembro suplente del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y vicepresidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.

articles.title: ACNC comenta la "Cumbre de Seguridad Nuclear" de Seul
articles.content:
ACNC comenta la "Cumbre de Seguridad Nuclear" de Seul
 Pyongyang, 23 de febrero (ACNC) -- Segun trascendidos, Estados Unidos y los titeres surcoreanos coauspiciaran a finales de marzo en Seul la "Cumbre de Seguridad Nuclear". 
					 Es decir, los anfitriones de esa reunion internacional sobre la "seguridad nuclear" son precisamente EE.UU., que uso primero las armas nucleares en el mundo, y el Sur de Corea, deposito mas grande de armas nucleares norteamericanas. 
					
					 Veremos pronto una payasada que orquestarian el amo gringo y su satelite surcoreano.
					
					 Para colmo, coincidiendo con la cumbre, EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos desarrollaran los ejercicios militares conjuntos "Key Resolve" y "Foal Eagle", conocidos como simulacros de guerra nuclear contra la RPDC, lo cual constituye una burla e insulto a la sociedad internacional.
					
					 La apertura de la "Cumbre de Seguridad Nuclear" en el Sur de Corea es la continuacion de la campana nuclear anti-RPDC que lanzan mas abiertamente EE.UU. y la banda de traidores surcoreanos. 
					
					 Esos ultimos quieren justificar sus acciones encaminadas a la guerra nuclear anti-RPDC, al sumarse a la campana de EE.UU. para atropellar a esta pretextando la inexistente "amenaza nuclear".
					
					 Por inmediato, intentan esquivar las criticas de la opinion publica por el fracaso total de su politica interior y exterior y evadir la severa sentencia de la poblacion en las "elecciones generales". 
					
					 Aunque la banda de Lee Myung Bak, aislada dentro y fuera del pais, auspicie esa "cumbre" para mejorar su imagen, no podra liberarse de su deshonrada etiqueta de lacayo de EE.UU. para la guerra nuclear.
					
					 La apertura de la "Cumbre de Seguridad Nuclear" en Seul es un grave crimen que contraviene a la aspiracion de toda la nacion coreana y los pueblos del mundo a la paz y seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y es una intolerable provocacion a la RPDC. 
					
					 Si la cumbre se celebra por fin en Seul por la imposicion de EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos, ella producira efectos contraproducentes con la solucion del problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana dejando manchas y afrentas en la historia.

articles.title: Miembros de embajada rusa rinden homenaje a martires sovieticos
articles.content:
Miembros de embajada rusa rinden homenaje a martires sovieticos
 Pyongyang, 23 de febrero (ACNC) -- Con motivo del Dia de Defensores de la Patria, los miembros de la Embajada de la Federacion Rusa en Corea depositaron el dia 23 una ofrenda floral ante el Monumento a la Liberacion en esta capital.
					 En el acto estuvieron presentes el embajador Valery Sukhinin, el agregado militar Dmitri Zheleznikov y otros miembros de la sede diplomatica rusa, asi como los agregados militares de las embajadas de varios paises.
					
					 Luego de depositada la ofrenda floral a nombre de la embajada rusa, los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria de los martires del ejercito sovietico.
					
					 El mismo dia, los miembros de la embajada rusa realizaron otra ceremonia de homenaje ante las tumbas de los martires del ejercito sovietico, situadas en el capitalino municipio de Sadong.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun revela objetivo de ola de represion en Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun revela objetivo de ola de represion en Sur de Corea
 Pyongyang, 23 de febrero (ACNC) -- Las autoridades surcoreanas recrudecen la represion contra las fuerzas progresistas con el fin de realizar su ambicion de retomar el poder al crear un clima violento en visperas de las "elecciones de parlamentarios".
					 Revela el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual de este jueves y continua: 
					
					 Por los crimenes de toda indole cometidos durante 4 anos de su mandato, la banda conservadora surcoreana es sometida a la condena y denuncia de la poblacion. 
					
					 Los compinches de Lee Myung Bak, acobardados ante la creciente determinacion de distintos estratos de sentenciar al "poder" actual, se apresuraron a lanzar la campana de represion violenta contra las fuerzas progresistas para sofocar el clima antigubernamental y agrupar a las fuerzas conservadoras. 
					
					 Al igual que sus antecesores vendepatrias, la banda de Lee Myung Bak cayo en la peor crisis de dominacion por su incapacidad, corrupcion y politicas antipopulares.
					
					 De ahi que pretende lograr la "seguridad del poder" y la retoma del poder reprimiendo a la poblacion progresista en virtud de la "ley de seguridad".
